answerText: Peace (also accept Pax or Eirene)[10] Peace is a work by this Athenian playwright whose other works of Old Comedy include characters like some Frogs who go "brekekek koax koax," and a woman trying to end a war by withholding sex, Lysistrata.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Chicago A  | 11 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In this work, one character flies to an audience with the gods on the back of a giant dung beetle. For 10 points each: [10] Name this work, in which Festival and Harvest are companions of the title character.
